headline.print_headline: McCourt, a Former Dodgers Owner, Will Acquire Marseille
headline.main: Former Dodgers Owner Frank McCourt to Buy French Soccer Team Marseille

snippet: McCourt, who had a contentious time in Major League Baseball, pledged to make Marseille a champion again....
lead_paragraph: McCourt, who had a contentious time in Major League Baseball, pledged to make Marseille a champion again.
